term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - plate height, H_eff, in chromatography
term.title: plate height

item.text: The column length (L) divided by the plate number: It is also called the height equivalent to one theoretical plate (HETP).

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 848 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
